meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Peggy Hesketh Perry Buck Elise Beraru Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #19.

td.p: Peggy Hesketh, a writer from Anaheim, California
Perry Buck, a law clerk from Portland, Oregon
Elise Beraru, an insurance underwriter from Los Angeles, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $36,050)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Much of this largest Louisiana city is below sea level')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Much of this largest Louisiana city is below sea level

[audience groans]

cannibals

Peggy
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_5', 'clue_J_1_5_stuck', '(Elise: What is California?)
[end-of-round signal sounds]
(Alex: Peggy or Perry, even though we\'ve had the time\'s up signal, either of you will be allowed to answer if you want.)
(Perry: What is Texas?)
(Alex: That is wrong, it will cost you. What is [*]?)

Florida

ElisePerry
Triple Stumper
')

ElisePerry
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
PerryWhat is 3?
$3,695
EliseWhat is 3
$5,800
4')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Number of leap years between 1985 & 2001')

tr.td: 2nd place: his & hers watches and a telephone system
